name: Cards
description:
This is a project I'm working on to play a game of cards with friends over the internet. Feel free to leave suggestions or things you would like to see added.

Controls:

Left Click - Pick up card

Right Click - Flip card over

O - options

S - shuffle cards

U - Uno cards (pre-shuffled)

Place a card in the red zone to stop others from seeing you flip a card over

Note: if a card is already visible when you place it in a red zone, it will remain visible whether you flip it or not.
